[u]–ò–≥—Ä–∞ Counter Strike 1.6 –≤—ã—à–ª–∞ 15 —Å–µ–Ω—Ç—è–±—Ä—è 2003 –≥–æ–¥–∞.[/u]

                                                                             [h1]English[/h1]

Counter-Strike game - a multiplayer online game, which really supports single mode, allowing you to play with bots. The main gameplay - a confrontation between two different teams - the terrorists and the police (special forces). At the beginning of the game, each player must choose his team (usually the team divided equally). There is also a possibility to become a spectator of the game - is commonly used in e-sports.

The goal of each team - on a map of performance tasks (hostage release or retention, or setting clearance min) or just destroy the enemy team. During execution of missions and winning the rounds, the player is given the money that he can spend on arms. Losing players also receive money, but in smaller numbers. For example, if the team has a minimum of means, it can hold a round without buying weapons that are likely to lose, but in the next round, it will be able to fully equip even in case of loss. The maximum possible amount typed in the player's account is $ 16,000 and the minimum - $ 0
[u]The game Counter Strike 1.6 came out September 15, 2003. [/u]
